text: Pierre Louis Prieur (Prieur de la Marne) (1 August 1756 â€“ 31 May 1827) was a French lawyer elected to the Estates-General of 1789. During the French Revolution he served as a deputy to the National Convention and held membership in the Committee of Public Safety. title: Pierre Louis Prieur
